ygData.subject: RE: mino horn
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeh they definitely changed em - like I said this was about 3 weeks ago. I m 48th and back then the only thing to get xp from in Steamfont (besides
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] mino horn
>Date: Wed, 20 Oct 1999 11:14:51 -0400
>
>If these mino guards were blue to a level 50, they've been changed
>recently.
>I was there last week with most of my guild, trying to get Meldrath's skull
>for a few of our rangers. The mino guards con'd green to me at 47, and
>yellow to one of our Paladin's in his 20's. Meldrath con'd blue however,
>and I'd say high blue from how hard he'd hit.
>
>
>Elwyn

Yeh they definitely changed em - like I said this was about 3 weeks ago. I'm
48th and back then the only thing to get xp from in Steamfont (besides
Watchmen) was the mino guards. Meldrath and the mino hero (the reason I was
there) were both pushovers. I had heard they made Meldrath part of a quest
and upped his level.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
